channel.title: Not able to add data source in Amazon EC2 linux instance
channel.description:
Hi,
I added a new datasource in my local and its working fine and able to connect it. But when I tried to add datasource in Amazon ec2 linux instance, it doesn't display on Create a new data source.
I followed the same steps in my local as well as in Amazon ec2 instance to add the new datasource.
Can anyone help?

item.title: Not able to add data source in Amazon EC2 linux instance
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Which data source are you trying to add?

Read full topic
item.source: Not able to add data source in Amazon EC2 linux instance
